definition[0]: done immediately while you are at a particular place
example[0]: Doctors can often give on-the-spot treatment.
definition[1]: if you do something on the spot, you do it immediately, often without thinking about it very carefully
example[1]: He had to make a decision on the spot.
definition[2]: if you are on the spot, you are in the place where something is happening
example[2]: We ought to find out the views of the people on the spot.
definition[3]: if you walk, run, or jump on the spot, you do it staying in the same place, without moving around
